definition: to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)

sentences.english: Isomers are defined as compounds having the same formula but different structures.
sentences.chinese: 異構體被定義爲化學式相同而結構不同的化合物。

sentences.english: The spectral patterns can be used to characterize the above stereoisomers.
sentences.chinese: 其譜態可作爲上述立體異構體的結構區分特徵。

sentences.english: Allene is an isomer of methyl acetylene.
sentences.chinese: 甲基乙炔的一種異構體。

sentences.english: This toxin is a class of monocyclic heptapeptides with many different isomerides.
sentences.chinese: 該毒素是一類具有多種異構體的環狀多肽物質。

sentences.english: Solvent took a significant effect on proportion between isomers of di-nitrated TPP.
sentences.chinese: 溶劑對二硝基TPP兩個異構體的比例有較大影響。

sentences.english: Special considerations necessary for stereochemical impurity investigations are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 特別對於光學異構體相關物質的研究也進行了討論。

sentences.english: Finally, the theoretical hardness of high-density C3N4 polymorphs is predicted.
sentences.chinese: 最後，預測了高密度C3N4異構體的理論硬度。

sentences.english: Draw perspective formulas for the isomers of isoleucine.
sentences.chinese: 畫出異亮氨酸異構體的透視式。

sentences.english: Catechol was determined in the phenyl dihydroxide isomers by fluorophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 用熒光光度法測定苯二酚異構體中的鄰苯二酚。

sentences.english: Stereochemistry deals with stereoisomers and with asymmetric synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 立體化學研究立體異構體以及不對稱合成法。

sentences.english: Phenol and cresol isomers could be well separated in liquid crystal PBOB packed column.
sentences.chinese: 苯酚和甲酚異構體在液晶PBOB填充柱上分離良好。

sentences.english: Which isomer of carvone do you have?
sentences.chinese: 你所得到的香芹酮異構體是哪一種呢？

sentences.english: The palonosetron injection has the advantages of high stability and less isomer.
sentences.chinese: 本發明的帕洛諾司瓊注射液穩定性高，異構體減少。

sentences.english: In this pater the separation of the isomers of xylene by using the adsorption separation technology is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了採用吸附分離技術分離二甲苯異構體。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION This observation also suggests that E-isomer has a stronger ability to quench radical than Z-isomer did.
sentences.chinese: 結論反式異構體淬滅羥自由基的能力比順式異構體強。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION This observation also suggests that E-isomer has a stronger ability to quench radical than Z-isomer did.
sentences.chinese: 結論反式異構體淬滅羥自由基的能力比順式異構體強。
